scripts.expo:start: cd apps/expo && cross-env DARK_MODE=media EXPO_ROUTER_APP_ROOT=./app EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 npx expo start --port 8081
scripts.expo:web: cd apps/expo && cross-env DARK_MODE=class EXPO_ROUTER_APP_ROOT=./app EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 npx expo start --web --port 8081
scripts.expo:ios: cd apps/expo && cross-env DARK_MODE=media EXPO_ROUTER_APP_ROOT=./app EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 npx expo start --ios
scripts.expo:android: cd apps/expo && cross-env DARK_MODE=media EXPO_ROUTER_APP_ROOT=./app EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 npx expo start --android
scripts.expo:android-dev-build: cd apps/expo && cross-env DARK_MODE=media npx expo run:android
scripts.expo:ios-dev-build: cd apps/expo && cross-env DARK_MODE=media npx expo run:ios
scripts.expo:storybook-ios: cd apps/expo && cross-env DARK_MODE=media EXPO_ROUTER_APP_ROOT=./app EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 STORYBOOK_ENABLED='true' npx expo start --ios
scripts.expo:storybook-android: cd apps/expo && cross-env DARK_MODE=media EXPO_ROUTER_APP_ROOT=./app EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 STORYBOOK_ENABLED='true' npx expo start --android
scripts.lint: cd apps/next && npm run lint && cd ../expo && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd apps/next && npx prettier --write "{,!(node_modules)/**/}*.{tsx,ts,js,jsx}" && cd ../expo && npx prettier --write "{,!(node_modules)/**/}*.{tsx,ts,js,jsx}"
scripts.postinstall: echo "postinstall skipped (patch-package disabled for Expo-only workspace)"
